rooms.description: Open and inviting space with Chettinad architectural elements like intricate carvings.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to maximize natural light as per Vastu principles, with Chettinad-style d√©cor.
Modular dining area that opens into the living room for an open-plan feel.
Modern kitchen with traditional Chettinad motifs. Equipped with ample counter space and storage solutions.
Functional bathroom integrated into the living area for seamless use of space.
Primary bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side to ensure privacy and ventilation. Adheres to Vastu by placing the master bed in the north-east corner.
Secondary bedroom, designed for flexible use as an additional guest room or office space if needed.
Dedicated home gym with state-of-the-art equipment and ample space for fitness routines. Incorporates natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side.
Dedicated home office space with ergonomic layout and enhanced sound insulation for productivity, positioned in the south-west corner as per Vastu for stability.

openings.description: Primary entrance door opening to the north with intricate Chettinad detailing.
Service entrance for utilities and garbage disposal, ensuring minimal disturbance to living areas.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room to maximize natural light.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on master bedroom and private gym for privacy and ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with private en-suite bathroom and ample closet space. Designed with a peaceful ambiance and Vastu alignment in the north-east corner.
Secondary bedroom with access to a private balcony overlooking the garden area for fresh air.
Ensuite bathroom attached to primary bedroom for convenience and privacy.
Private balcony space overlooking the west, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows with lattice screens typical of Chettinad style.

openings.description: Stairs connecting ground and first floors, designed with Chettinad-style balustrades for aesthetic appeal.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the secondary bedroom and balcony to enhance natural lighting and ventilation.
